Quick Tip: Highcharts credit in a new window

May 28, 2017

Here is a great fiddle by Torstein Hønsi, that shows how to have highcharts credits open in a new window/tab.

Note: if you are using for free, you MUST (in the below) re-add the text highcharts.com (in place of your domain). If their domain is not seen, you will be against the license.

Resources:

  • Highcharts.com - First chart
  • JS Fiddle for right click by Torstein Hønsi
